Strep Throat and Head, Foot, & Mouth Disease

nav.div: Knoxville CUSD #202 » For Parents » Health Information » Stop Spreading Germs (including Coronavirus)

p.span:
One of the routine "battles" we fight in school is the spread of germs, which can lead to the spread of illness, infection, etc... Recently, the spread of the Coronavirus has received a lot of attention. The Center for Disease Control (CDC) is recommending that the best way to minimize the spread of germs is simple...regularly washing hands with soap and water. This is a practice we encourage at school, and a practice we encourage you to implement at home.
If you have any questions about the Coronavirus, or anything else health related here at school, feel free to contact the District Nurse, Linda Murray, at lmurray@bluebullets.org. More information about handwashing can be found in the flyer below.
Washing Hands Properly
CDC Coronavirus Factsheet
